item.description:
Pretty simple folks, the goal for today is to ride your machine to work.

Thanks to Joe XT 225 & Michael KLR KId for the suggestion:

The annual Ride to Work Day moves to the ‘third Monday in June.’

The next Ride to Work Day is MONDAY, JUNE 15, 2009. It is the 18th annual Ride to Work Day.

The Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme (FIM) has endorsed this day, and is promoting the ‘Third Monday in June’ worldwide as the annual Ride to Work Day.

How Many group members can we get to commit to participating?

http://www.ridetowork...

weather permitting of course, but it will be an awesome event if we can get everyone to RSVP yes.
item.name: Ride your scooter to work day
